name: propSort

parameters.name: ...params
grammar: sort property | ( '[', sort property, ',', sort function, ']' )
parameters.description: If just a `sort property` is provied, the objects are sorted via the default sort function of `Array.prototype.sort`. `<` signifies a sort in the default direction and can be omitted unless `property` ends in `<`. `>` signfifies a sort in the oposite direction.

description: `propSort` is used to sort an array of obejcts based on their propery values. The objects are sorted according to the first `parameter`. For any object that has the same value for the `nth parameter`, the `n+1th parameter` is used to break that tie.
